text:
@detroitnews This is nuts. Have you not seen the recent curve in Florida for Covid19?
It’s bad enough that DeSantis is hosting 50k in Jacksonville from all over our Nation for the RNC. Aug24-27. Cruise ships 4 hotel space! Petri dish in Florida!
